context: Hi! What types of movies do you like?
I like comedies. Can you suggest any good ones?
One of my favorites is The Jerk (1979). Have you seen it?
It's a bit older. Tropic Thunder (2008) is more recent and good. Have you seen that?
No I haven't. But it sounds good
resp: Groundhog Day (1993) and Napoleon Dynamite (2004) are also very good.
